name: WorldWar7
description:
This was made in 1 Day as a test with my first Menu and Pause Menu.

This Game will eventually have a story mode And a Multiplayer.

Feel free to rate or leave me some good advice for this game.

Controls:

WASD: Movement

Mouse: Look

ESC: Pause

Mouse1: Shoot

Mouse2: Aim

Youtube:

and Also give me some credit for the Game
